trans-unit.source: Counters Manifest Preprocessor Properties for Driver Projects
trans-unit.target: Counters Manifest Preprocessor Properties for Driver Projects

trans-unit.source: Sets the properties for the [**CTRPP**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Desktop/aa372128) tool that parses and validates your counters manifest.
trans-unit.target: Sets the properties for the [**CTRPP**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Desktop/aa372128) tool that parses and validates your counters manifest.

trans-unit.source: For information about working with performance counters, see [Performance Counters](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Desktop/aa373083).
trans-unit.target: For information about working with performance counters, see [Performance Counters](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Desktop/aa373083).

trans-unit.source: For information about using performance counters in a kernel-mode Windows driver, see [Kernel Mode Performance Monitoring](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Ff548159).
trans-unit.target: For information about using performance counters in a kernel-mode Windows driver, see [Kernel Mode Performance Monitoring](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Ff548159).

trans-unit.source: Setting the Counters Manifest Preprocessor properties for driver projects
trans-unit.target: Setting the Counters Manifest Preprocessor properties for driver projects

trans-unit.source: Open the property pages for your driver project.
trans-unit.target: Open the property pages for your driver project.

trans-unit.source: Right-click the driver project in **Solution Explorer** and select **Properties**.
trans-unit.target: Right-click the driver project in **Solution Explorer** and select **Properties**.

trans-unit.source: In the property pages for the driver project, click **Configuration Properties** and then click **Counters Manifest Preprocessor Properties**.
trans-unit.target: In the property pages for the driver project, click **Configuration Properties** and then click **Counters Manifest Preprocessor Properties**.

trans-unit.source: Set the properties for the project.
trans-unit.target: Set the properties for the project.

trans-unit.source: If you want to add this property page to your project so that you can run the CTRPP tool during the build process, see the [WDK and Visual Studio build environment](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Hh454286) and the [Ctrpp task](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Hh454206).
trans-unit.target: If you want to add this property page to your project so that you can run the CTRPP tool during the build process, see the [WDK and Visual Studio build environment](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Hh454286) and the [Ctrpp task](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Hardware/Hh454206).

trans-unit.source: Specifies the prefix to use for the global variables and functions defined in the generated header file (same as the -prefix command option.)
trans-unit.target: Specifies the prefix to use for the global variables and functions defined in the generated header file (same as the -prefix command option.)

trans-unit.source: Specifies additional options to the CTRPP tool.
trans-unit.target: Specifies additional options to the CTRPP tool.

trans-unit.source: Generates code that is binary compatible with versions of Windows prior to Windows 7 (same as the -backcompat command option).
trans-unit.target: Generates code that is binary compatible with versions of Windows prior to Windows 7 (same as the -backcompat command option).

trans-unit.source: Reverts to generating code using Windows Vista code templates.
trans-unit.target: Reverts to generating code using Windows Vista code templates.

trans-unit.source: This option causes CTRPP to generate four output files: two header files (.h, _r.h), a resource file (.rc), and a source code file (c).
trans-unit.target: This option causes CTRPP to generate four output files: two header files (.h, _r.h), a resource file (.rc), and a source code file (c).

trans-unit.source: Generate header file for containing counter names and GUIDs
trans-unit.target: Generate header file for containing counter names and GUIDs

trans-unit.source: Creates a header file that assigns symbols to the counter set names and GUIDs for each counter set in the manifest.
trans-unit.target: Creates a header file that assigns symbols to the counter set names and GUIDs for each counter set in the manifest.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the header file that the tool generates.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name of the header file that the tool generates.

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a path, the file is generated in the current folder.
trans-unit.target: If you do not specify a path, the file is generated in the current folder.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the resource file that the tool generates.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name of the resource file that the tool generates.

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a path, the file is generated in the current folder.
trans-unit.target: If you do not specify a path, the file is generated in the current folder.

trans-unit.source: Generates a binary counter file per provider.
trans-unit.target: Generates a binary counter file per provider.

trans-unit.source: Generates a summary global file GenSumResource.BIN.
trans-unit.target: Generates a summary global file GenSumResource.BIN.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path to generate binary counter files.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the path to generate binary counter files.

trans-unit.source: If no path is specified, the current directory is used.
trans-unit.target: If no path is specified, the current directory is used.

trans-unit.source: Generates a header file for containing counter names and ids.
trans-unit.target: Generates a header file for containing counter names and ids.

trans-unit.source: Generates a header file for the provider.
trans-unit.target: Generates a header file for the provider.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name for the resource file.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the name for the resource file.

trans-unit.source: The default names of the files that the tool generates are based on the name of the manifest file that you pass to the [**CTRPP**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Desktop/aa372128) tool.
trans-unit.target: The default names of the files that the tool generates are based on the name of the manifest file that you pass to the [**CTRPP**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/Windows/Desktop/aa372128) tool.
